name: Kanea
description:
Kanea is a comet simulation of futuristic-style combat and light speed chaos with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Kanea includes Quest and Target challenges, Online Battle Royal Matches KOH death match, and more than 10 billion possible color combinations at disposal.

With consistent updates Kanea plans to continuously add features into the game.

Versions:

0.0.1
  • Kanea was introduced.
  • 3 Target stages.
  • 7 Experimental Stages.

0.0.2
  • Color customization was added.
  • 2+ Target Stages.

0.0.3
  • Improved Bouncing Mechanism

0.0.4
  • Added easier-to-control movement.
  • Removed bounce delay and disabled movement from the bounce.
